DOC.brief_title: Acute Single Meal Effects Trout Cardiovascular Risk Markers Plasma Proteome
DOC.detailed_description: In control , single blind human single meal study acute effect farm rainbow trout , feed various feed versus control meal poultry meat cardiovascular risk marker plasma protein expression investigate . 6 healthy men , age 40-70 , randomize trout fed vegetable , marine mix different composition vegetable marine feed . Outcome variables blood pressure , pulse wave analyse , pulse wave velocity , plasma protein profile , plasma triglyceride . The hypothesis study feed change marine origin primarily vegetable origin content long chain n-3 poly unsaturated fatty acid ( n-3 PUFA ) decrease meat thus possibly result decreased effect health . Furthermore , feed trout also expect give rise difference human plasma protein profile fatty acid composition consumption , could associate physiological effect .
DOC.criteria: Non regular smoker Body Mass Index ( 18.530 kg/m2 ) Able eat fish Exercise > 10 h/week Chronical disease ( eg . cardiovascular diabetes ) Regular medication Fish oil supplementation Blood donation 2 month prior participation Above maximum recommend alcohol intake Blood pressure > 160/100 mm Hg
